thread.title: Luxury Awaits: Win An Unforgettable Week-Long New England Getaway For Two By Entering Four Seasons' #BostonUncovered Social Media Photo Contest
thread.title_full: Luxury Awaits: Win An Unforgettable Week-Long New England Getaway For Two By Entering Four Seasons' #BostonUncovered Social Media Photo Contest - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Luxury Awaits: Win An Unforgettable Week-Long New England Getaway For Two By Entering Four Seasons' #BostonUncovered Social Media Photo Contest
text:
Four Seasons Hotel Boston
Winner receives luxury accommodations at Four Seasons Hotel Boston, roundtrip business class air transportation for two courtesy of American Airlines, a stay on Cape Cod's Nantucket Island and more.
BOSTON , Aug. 18, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- This fall, Four Seasons celebrates the quintessential American beauty of New England's gateway city and Cape Cod with the #BostonUncovered social media photo contest, an opportunity for guests to win an unforgettable luxury adventure to Boston for two, including roundtrip business class air transportation, courtesy of American Airlines.
Beginning today and running through August 28, 2015 , the #BostonUncovered photo contest invites residents of the continental U.S. to enter an image via Facebook, Twitter or Instagram based on the theme "what makes you think of Boston ?"
"After last season's record winter, one may have momentarily forgotten just how beautiful Boston and its surroundings are, uncovered from snow," says Ryan Jimenez , Director of Public Relations at Four Seasons Hotel Boston. "With the help of social media mavens from across the country, the #BostonUncovered photo contest will showcase why the city known as 'America's cradle of liberty' is one the nation's most beautiful-and historic-destinations, with pictures saying it all."
The week-long prize package includes the following:
Luxury accommodations at Four Seasons Hotel Boston, with a special #BostonUncovered welcome amenity Roundtrip business class air transportation for two to Boston , courtesy of American Airlines Chauffeured transportation from Boston's Logan Airport to Four Seasons Hotel Boston Dinner for two at the iconic Bristol Restaurant and Bar at Four Seasons Hotel Boston, overlooking Boston's historic public garden VIP experiences in Boston , a signed Red Sox player's jersey and dinner for two at Davio's, courtesy of the Greater Boston Convention and Visitors Bureau Round trip air transportation for two to Cape Cod's Nantucket Island, courtesy of Cape Air Luxury accommodations at the exquisite waterfront White Elephant Hotel on Nantucket Island, a Cape Cod landmark HOW TO ENTER
Visit the #BostonUncovered web page. Submit a photo on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram based around the theme of "What makes you think of Boston ?" For instance, you can submit an image of an experience that is undeniably Boston , a perfect Boston moment captured in time or a picture of your favorite Boston landmark, monument, piece of architecture, park, green space or urban landscape. Tag @FSBoston on Twitter or Instagram and use the hashtag #BostonUncovered in your post for a chance to win. The contest is open between August 18, 2015 to August 28, 2015 to residents of the continental United States . The winner will be announced by Four Seasons Hotel Boston via social media on Friday, August 28 .
Visit the contest web page at www.seebostonuncovered.com for contest rules or more information.
Contact:
Ryan Jimenez
617-351-2161
